=======================
Changes for stxnext.pdb
=======================

2008/07/07 0.1.0:
=================

- Initial release.

2008/08/26 0.1.1:
=================

- Prompt error fix

2008/10/11 0.1.2:
=================

- Zope3 BrowserView and DevelopmentMode import fix

2008/11/12 0.2.0:
=================

- tools useful to analyze ZODB

2009/05/07 0.2.1:
=================

- remove conflict with Products.PDBDebugMode
- now possible to use set_trace function in ZMI's python scripts
- added 'req' variable short name for context.REQUEST
